FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 2 / Stratagems /
View On Teletraan1.net

Drop 'Em

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What does it mean that “my deck can have up to 1 extra STAR of cards?” Does that mean characters or battle cards?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    Your Battle deck may include 1 Star card and still be considered a Legal Deck. Examples include Mounted Missiles, Energized Field, Leap of Faith, etc.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Do these abilities apply to both modes for Arcee?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    Yes, Alt and Bot Mode will gain the benefit.
  3. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    This is legal to play in Junkion, but what common star cards even are there to play?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    There are now 3 Star cards at the Common rarity for Junkion with the addition of ATP-2: Hands-Free Artillery, Bullseye Aegis, and Spotlights.
    High-Speed Chase
    1. I repair 1 from Menasor on my 2nd action for turn. What about my 3rd? Or 4th?
    No, you only heal from the 2 nd action played.
  4. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens if I reveal the new ATP-2 Secret Action “Survive” while my Menasor has 30+ damage? Do I take 2 less?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    No, Sturdy, does not stack with itself; you can’t have multiple instances of Sturdy on a character or battle card. (See KEYWORD Section on Sturdy)
  5. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    If I repair damage to go below 30, do I lose the Sturdy ability?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    Yes. The damage threshold trigger on Menasor uses the trigger word “while” which is constantly checking to see whether its criterion is met. Anything after the arrow would be turned off as soon as the criterion before the arrow is no longer met.
